text.en: Padmākara, who embodies all the buddhas’ compassion,
text.en-trans: gyal kün tukjé rang zuk pema jung

text.en: With special care for beings of this age of fivefold strife,
text.en-trans: nga dö dro la lhakpar jé tsewé

text.en: Manifested in the form of one who wears the saffron robes—
text.en-trans: ngurmik dzinpé gar gyi namrol pa

text.en: Incomparable lord Atiśa, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: nyammé jowo jé la solwa deb

text.en: Protector, may you regard us well with your happy gaze,
text.en-trans: gön khyö gyepé chen gyi lek zik né

text.en: And with your loving hands dispel my own and others’ flaws,
text.en-trans: tsewé chak gi dak sok dro kün gyi

text.en: The obscurations caused by karma and the afflictions,
text.en-trans: lé nyön dribpé drima kün sal né

text.en: And lead us all to Sukhāvatī, pure land of perfect bliss!
text.en-trans: dechen dakpé zhing du drenpar dzö
